bibl.title: Reconstructing Pathyris' Archives. A Multicultural Community in Hellenistic Egypt. (Collectanea Hellenistica. III.)

publisher.orgName: Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Comité Klassieke Studies

bibl.biblScope: tabl., arbres généal., graphiques, 14 figg. n./bl. et coul. et 2 dépl.
bibl.note: Preface. - I. Picture of an Egyptian village. From Pathyris to Gebelein. - II. Archives. Terminology, typology and writing material. - III. Reconstruction of Pathyris' archives. - IV. Composition of Pathyris' family archives. "Family archives are goldmines". - V. Survey of Pathyris' archives. - VI. Museums survey. - Bibliographical abbreviations. Indices and lists.
